definitions: 怪物[かいぶつ] (n) monster

japanese: どうした？　怪物さんよ？どこ向いているんだ？

definitions: 整う[ととのう] (v5u, vi) to be ready, to be prepared, to be arranged,to be in order, to be put in order, to be well-ordered, to be well-proportioned, to be harmonious,to be adjusted, to be regulated, to be refined (e.g. of a face),to be settled (e.g. treaty, contract), to be completed

japanese: そうか！狙いはセフィロス！北の果てのクレーターだ！

definitions: 突き抜ける[つきぬける] (v1, vi) to pierce through, to break through
english: It went right through Weapon…

definitions: オペレーター (n) operator
english: (operator)
japanese: (オペレーター）

definitions: 切り替える[きりかえる] (v1, vt) to change, to exchange, to convert, to renew, to throw a switch, to replace, to switch over
english: It must cool for 3 hours or it won't work. Reeve, shut off the machine!
japanese: 何者かが本体操作に切り換えています！

definitions: 総力[そうりょく] (n, adj-no) total energy, all efforts

definitions: 撃退[げきたい] (n, vs) repulse, repelling (e.g. the enemy), driving back
english: Don't be foolish! I don't remember anyone putting you in charge!
japanese: 治安維持部門は総力をあげてあいつらを撃退してやる！

definitions: 越える[こえる] (v1, vt) to cross over, to cross, to pass through, to pass over (out of), to go beyond, to go past,to exceed, to surpass, to be more (than)

japanese: クックックッ……科学を超えて行け……

definitions: 無力[むりょく] (adj-na, n, adj-no) powerlessness, helplessness, incompetent

definitions: 疾っくに[とっくに] (adv) long ago, already, a long time ago

definitions: 汲み出す[くみだす] (v5s, vt) to bail out (water), to dip out, to ladle out, to scoop out, to pump out,to start drawing (water)

definitions: 桁[けた] (n) column, beam, girder, crossbeam, spar, yard,digit, decade, order of magnitude

definitions: 進路[しんろ] (n) route, course, path,one's future course (e.g. after graduating high school)

definitions: 勢い[いきおい] (adv) force, vigor, vigour, energy, spirit, life,influence, authority, power, might,impetus, momentum, course (of events),naturally, necessarily
勢[せい] (n) energy,military strength
勢[ぜい] (suf) groups engaged in some activity (players, companies, forces, etc.)

definitions: 交通[こうつう] (n, vs) traffic, transportation, communication, exchange (of ideas, etc.), intercourse

definitions: 封鎖[ふうさ] (n, vs) blockade,freezing (funds)

japanese: スラムからの交通機関は完全封鎖みたいよ……

definitions: パラシュート (n) parachute

definitions: さくさく (adv, adv-to, vs) crisp (not moist or juicy), crunchy, flaky (as in pastry),crunching sound (of walking on snow, frost, sand, etc.),doing skillfully and efficiently, doing quickly, proceeding smoothly,sound of pouring liquid,speaking clearly

japanese: おう！　サクサクッと行こうぜ！サクサクっとよっ！

仁王[におう] (n) the two guardian Deva kings

definitions: 雲[くも] (n) cloud
蜘蛛[くも] (n) spider

definitions: 見下す[みくだす] (v5s, vt) to despise, to look down on

definitions: 身ごもる[みごもる] (v5r, vi) to become pregnant

definitions: 罪滅ぼし[つみほろぼし] (n, vs) atonement, expiation
